name: GAMINGPC
description: Our gaming computers impress with perfectly matched branded components. With the RX 6600 8GB you are well prepared for all current game titles.With the AMD Ryzen 5 5500 and fast 16GB RAM, this Memory:PC offers outstanding performance and brilliant display at the highest level for the most demanding tasks and is a must for every PC gamer.

name: Galaxy S7
description: Introducing the smartphone your life can not do without, The Samsung Galaxy S7. Packed with features to keep you both productive and entertained, all in a sleek, slim design that fits comfortably in your hand or pocket.
